proposal1.heroHeadline: Evolve is burning over 2,000 hours a year on manual proposal writing. Here is exactly where it goes.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, crafting proposals drains hours from your team. With our AI, generate client-ready proposals in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Every detail below is a direct hit to Evolve's time and resources.

problems.title: Time Sinkhole
problems.description: Evolve spends an average of 40 hours per week on proposal writing. That is 2,080 hours a year not spent strategizing or engaging with clients.

problems.title: Lost Deals
problems.description: Every delayed proposal response risks losing a potential client. In a fast-paced industry, even a day's delay can mean losing a $50,000 contract.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Manually crafted proposals often lack consistent branding. This inconsistency can lead to a 30% decrease in perceived professionalism.

problems.title: High Labor Costs
problems.description: Paying skilled marketers to write proposals costs Evolve around $100,000 annually. This is money that could fuel client acquisition efforts.

problems.title: Employee Burnout
problems.description: Proposal writing is tedious and contributes to burnout. Burnout can lead to a 20% decrease in productivity and higher turnover rates.

problems.title: Inefficient Follow-ups
problems.description: Without proper tracking, follow-ups are inefficient. Missing these critical touchpoints can reduce conversion rates by up to 15%.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system transforms every one of those losses into opportunities.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take days to prepare. Our system completes them in 47 seconds, allowing your team to focus on client relationships.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Brand consistency is often compromised manually. Our AI ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with Evolve's brand, every time.

solutions.title: Cost Reduction
solutions.description: High labor costs for proposal writing are unsustainable. Our automation cuts these expenses significantly, freeing up budget for growth initiatives.

solutions.title: Enhanced Employee Productivity
solutions.description: Manual processes lead to burnout and inefficiency. Automation energizes your team, allowing them to be more productive and satisfied.

solutions.title: AI-Driven Follow-up
solutions.description: Tracking follow-ups manually is error-prone. Our system automates this, ensuring no potential client slips through the cracks.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Evolve's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Evolve around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Evolve.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Empower Acme Corp with Evolve's Digital Marketing Expertise
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Let's transform your digital presence with a data-driven strategy, enhancing your customer engagement and conversion rates.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Each missed opportunity is lost revenue for Acme Corp.

problems.title: Low Website Conversion
problems.description: Your current website conversion rate is below industry standards. Every visitor who leaves is a potential customer lost.

problems.title: Ineffective SEO
problems.description: Poor search engine rankings mean your competitors are getting the visibility you deserve. This results in lost leads daily.

problems.title: Weak Brand Presence
problems.description: A lack of cohesive branding across digital channels is costing you recognition and trust in the market.

problems.title: Underperforming Ads
problems.description: Your ad campaigns aren't delivering expected ROI. This is money spent without significant returns.

problems.title: Email Engagement Decline
problems.description: Decreasing open and click-through rates mean fewer customers are interacting with your content, leading to missed sales opportunities.

problems.title: Social Media Inactivity
problems.description: Inconsistent posting on social media is leading to a loss of engagement and brand loyalty among your followers.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our tailored solutions address these losses head-on.

solutions.title: SEO Optimization
solutions.description: Improve your search engine rankings to capture more organic traffic and reduce lost leads. This boosts visibility and engagement.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: Revamp your site to enhance user experience and increase conversion rates. This turns visitors into loyal customers.

solutions.title: Email Marketing
solutions.description: Craft compelling campaigns to boost open rates and engagement. This keeps your audience connected and interested.

solutions.title: Brand Strategy
solutions.description: Develop a strong brand presence that resonates across all platforms. This builds recognition and trust with your audience.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Evolve is your partner for growth with our proven strategies.

whyUsCards.title: Collaborative Approach
whyUsCards.description: We work closely with you to ensure our strategies align with your business goals.

whyUsCards.title: Data-Driven Decisions
whyUsCards.description: Our strategies are backed by data, ensuring effective outcomes and measurable success.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Track Record
whyUsCards.description: We've helped businesses like yours achieve remarkable growth and enhanced visibility.

whyUsCards.title: Transparent Communication
whyUsCards.description: We keep you informed and involved through every step of the process, building trust and clarity.

socialProof.label: Average increase in ROI for clients

proposal2.teamIntro: Our team is dedicated to your success.

team.name: Marnie Ochs-raleigh
team.bio: Marnie leads our strategy development and client relationship management with expertise and care. Her focus is on delivering impactful solutions.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Strategy
process.description: We dive deep into your business to tailor our approach.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: Our team begins executing the strategy with precision.

process.title: Optimization
process.description: We fine-tune our tactics for maximum impact.

process.title: Review & Adjust
process.description: We present results and adjust strategies for future success.

lead.company_description: Evolve Systems specializes in design and branding, website development, digital marketing and search engine optimization (SEO).  We offer a wide range of options to build a web presence and develop a marketing strategy. We specialize in developing WordPress websites, ecommerce websites on various platforms to fit our clients' needs, and custom software development.
